pt.fg.dbtools.bdbxml
Class BDBXmlDatabaseHelper

java.lang.Object
  pt.fg.dbtools.bdbxml.BDBXmlDatabaseHelper

public class BDBXmlDatabaseHelper
extends Object

Module built to deal with Oracle Barkeley's XML native Database as an abstraction layer.

Since:
29/Mai/2011
Version:
0.1
Author:
Francisco Alexandre de Gouveia

Constructor Detail

BDBXmlDatabaseHelper

public BDBXmlDatabaseHelper(String environmentPath,
                            com.sleepycat.db.EnvironmentConfig environmentConfig,
                            com.sleepycat.dbxml.XmlManagerConfig xmlManagerConfig,
                            String containerName,
                            int containerType)
                     throws IOException,
                            com.sleepycat.db.DatabaseException
Constructor with all the parameters. May be used to configure without the default values.
When parameters are null, default values are used.
Default values are:
  • EnvironmentPath: "./data"
  • EnvironmentConfig
    • AllowCreate: true
    • InitializeLogging: true
    • InitializeLocking: true
    • InitializeCache: true
    • Transactional: true
    • RunRecovery: true
  • XmlManagerConfig
    • AdoptEnvironment: true
    • AllowAutoOpen: true
    • AllowExternalAccess: true
  • ContainerName: "pt.fg.dbxml.container.dbxml"

Parameters:
environmentPath - If null, default environment path will be used
environmentConfig - If null, default configurations will be used
xmlManagerConfig - If null, default configurations will be used
containerName - If null, default container name will be used
containerType - Defines if to store nodes or whole documents. Use XmlContainer.NodeContainer or XmlContainer.WholedocContainer
Throws:
IOException
com.sleepycat.db.DatabaseException
